header.subtitle: Rep
header.description: Keep your living spaces lizard-free with Lizard Rep - the ultimate organic solution for homeowners/consumers. Whether you're protecting your kitchen, bedroom, or living areas, our innovative repellent ensures a lizard-free environment without compromising your family's safety.It is ideal for restaurants, hotels, offices, warehouses, and commercial establishments where maintaining a professional, pest-free environment is crucial. Lizard Rep provides a discreet, no mess, non-toxic solution to protect your workspace.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: Meet Emerald, the green goddess of facial oils. Emerald Deep Moisture Glow Oil provides skin with rich moisture and a glow that is lit – all in a lightweight, quick-absorbing formula. All hail, Queen Emerald.
